Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Promoting Risky Business: Legalized Gambling and the Governing of Risk”, Paper presented to the Annual Conference of the Canadian Political Science Association, Concordia University, Montreal 1-3 June.
Narrating Crisis and Decline in the EU”, Paper presented to the European Community Studies Association-Canada Conference, Ottawa, 26-28 April 2012
Searching for a Political Mythology of the European Union”, Paper presented to ECPR Standing Group on the European Union Conference, Tampere, 13-15 September.
“Understanding the Crisis: Did EU Studies Get It Wrong?”, ” Paper presented to ECPR Standing Group on the European Union Conference, Tampere, 13-15 September.
“Political Myth and Legitimacy in the European Union”, Paper presented to the Annual Meeting of the International Studies Association Meeting, San Francisco, 2-6 April.
Not So Different After All?: The EU and Myths of Exceptionalism”, Paper presented to the European Union Studies Association Conference, Boston, 4-6 March.
Birth of a Union?: The EU’s Search for a Foundational Myth”, Paper presented to the conference on, “The EU Politics of Memory”, European University Institute, Florence.
Narration and Crisis in the European Union”, Paper presented at the European Consortium for Political Research General Conference, Montreal, 26-29 August.

Politics Without a Centre: Political Change and Stability in Russia and Italy. Paper presented with Piotr Dutkiewicz at the European Consortium for Political Research General Conference, Montreal, 26-29 August.
Mythes territoriaux : Sécurité ontologique dans l’Union européenne. Paper presented to Workshop and seminar on Building the European Union, Université de Quebec a Montréal, Montréal.

Homeland security? Territorial myths and ontological security in the EU. Paper presented to the workshop on European Boundaries in Nationalist Times, European Studies Centre, Oxford University, Oxford.
